title: Cancel a Tour Booking
description: A customer needs to cancel their booking for a wine tasting tour.

tasks.description: Retrieve the tour booking using the customer's name or booking ID.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the correct tour reservation.
Agent finds that the cancellation is more than 48 hours in advance and is eligible for a full refund.

tasks.description: Cancel the booking and process the refund.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully cancels the tour and initiates a full refund.
